name: Beneath (itch) (SimonAshcroftGD)
description:
The world is burried in ice,
civilisation is in ruins

As the nomad you wander,
searching for ancestors to uncover

Board the wastes,
solar beacons you must place

Find the light at the end of the tunnel,
And discover what lies beneath

What is hidden in snow, comes forth in the thaw.

Controls

Play with keyboard or with a gamepad.

Left Thumbstick or WASD - Move

A or Spacebar - Jump

X or E key - Interact

Y or F key - Reset Character

Team Name:

Lunchbox Games
